name: the knight (inVincible)
description:
This is the first game I've created (for a high school project). Be mindful that it may have bugs, since I am relatively new to unity.

Assets I used - 

Asset - Animated Pixel Adventurer by rvros 

Asset - 2D Pixel Art Shardsoul Slayer Sprites by Elthen's Pixel Art Shop 

Asset - Rocky World Platformer | 2D Environments | Unity Asset Store 

https://free-game-assets.itch.io/free-war-pixel-art-game-backgrounds

https://gamesupply.itch.io/customizable-modular-healthbars
